jobs.name: WellCaddie
jobs.title: Lead Software Engineer
jobs.description: Implemented and facilitated a complete overhaul and refactor of both frontend and backend services of the WellCaddie platform directly resulting in a company valuation increase of several million dollars.

jobs.name: University of Oklahoma
jobs.title: PinYin Consultant
jobs.description: Assisted in developing a number of patented transliteration devices to enable Chinese speakers to gain a better grasp of the English language through newly researched translation techniques.

jobs.name: Tankvault
jobs.title: Software Engineering Internship
jobs.description: Developed web-based tooling to streamline oil and gas worker operations. Features developed included mapping applications used for route optimization, forecast indicators for field workers, as well as mobile alerts and monitoring for damaged oil production equipment.

jobs.name: University of Oklahoma
jobs.title: VR Software Engineer
jobs.description: Helped establish the first makerspace at the university while developing workflows and custom tooling for managing 3D printing services. Also helped develop O.V.A.L., a VR pedagogy tool currently used by universities nationwide. O.V.A.L. went on to host the worldâ€™s first remote pedagogy session in virtual reality.

community.name: Homebrew Website Club
community.title: Member
community.description: Collaborate with and teach individuals about self-hosting web projects, as well as tips and tricks on various frameworks and tech stacks.

community.name: Norman AR/VR
community.title: Member
community.description: Host weekly community meetings based around Augmented and Virtual Reality technologies, as well as provide consulting pro-bono for business leaders to explore AR/VR opportunities in their fields.

community.name: OU Virtual Reality Association
community.title: Co-founder/President
community.description: Created and managed a student organization with a board of individuals ingrained into the Virtual Reality development community. Hosted weekly meetings and workshops free to the public and assisted in Oculus NextGen Symposium entries; projects which led to full-time position offers for members.

community.name: Bizzell Memorial Library
community.title: Community Builder
community.description: Hosted a series of workshops aimed at introducing cutting-edge technologies like 3D Printing to students around the University of Oklahoma's campus.

community.name: OKC VR
community.title: Community Educator
community.description: Taught community workshops on Augmented and Virtual Reality application development using the Unity3D game engine.
